title: Acts Week 6 with Mika Edmondson
description:
For the final week of our journey through the book of Acts, Amanda is joined by Mika Edmondson, an author and the pastor of CPC Koinonia in Nashville. There’s a shipwreck, a storm, soldiers, and open-hearted island people. During Paul’s “tour of trials” as Amanda calls it, we watch the Lord carry him through and provide wonders and signs that signal the inbreaking of the kingdom. Friends, no matter what suffering we endure, God is eager to meet us in it and show His faithfulness.   


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 6 of the She Reads Truth Acts reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Acts collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/acts-week-6-with-mika-edmondson
